misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Keimola Golf.  A mainstay at the Hector Trophée, Timo has an impressive track record of success in this prestigious invitational event.

His first appearance was in 2022, and his competitive spirit has made him a formidable presence ever since.  In fact, he’s already claimed victory three times in the Hector Trophée, making him one of the most decorated players in the tournament's history, having won in 2021, Hector Trophée III, and again in 2022. He also competed in the 2023 and 2024 editions.

While Timo has yet to capture the coveted Victor trophy for the top individual performer, his exceptional skill and strategic prowess have solidified his reputation as a true champion. He is known for his dedication to the game and is a respected figure among his peers.

Beyond his tournament achievements, Timo is also recognized as a key ambassador for the AimPoint method of putting. His endorsement of the system highlights his focus on precision and technical mastery of all aspects of the game, traits which are undoubtedly key to his success on the course.
